description: This meta shows you how to retrieve a history of all purchased bill services including commission earned.

spec.from: This is the start date it can be in formats: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ or YYYY-MM-DD
spec.to: This is the end date, it can be in formats: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ or YYYY-MM-DD
spec.page: This is the page you want to start from
spec.reference: This is the customer ID, pass this if you want to retrieve bill history for a particular customer ID.
